value:
$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|It fills me with pride to hold an
honored Hatari festival so far from
home.$k$pAskr has plenty of festivals, but I
daresay this one will open your eyes.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|Yeah, right...$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリカアラ,ch03_19_Karla_F_Hatari,Face|If you say so...$k$p$WmMPID_双界アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|I don't quite see the point...$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Come on now, why are y'all lookin'
so glum? Festivals are a chance to
cut loose and party!$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|Hah! In Hatari, we work hard and play
harder. Let that be your first lesson,
friend.$k$pBut know this: our festivals are unlike
any you've seen. If you want to truly
experience everything it has to offer...$k$pYou're going to have to fight in the
tournament. Be warned, however...we
are dead serious about competition.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Wait, really? Dang. I'm not exactly
lookin' to become the next king of
the ring here.$k$pI just figured I could get somethin'
sweet out of it, like I did during the
harvest festival.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|I can't promise sweets, but I can
promise you'll test your mettle
against other fighters...and me.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Um... Is that really going to change
any minds? Fighting the wolf queen
herself isn't exactly a selling point.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|Nailah-queen...will fight too? That is...
exciting! Let me...cheer for you! I will
sing...as loud as I can!$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Oh... I stand corrected...$k$p

$WmMPID_双界アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|Let's keep our distance, Leanne, and
let the more seasoned fighters handle
the front lines.$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|Yes... OK!$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|I guess that means me. Stick close,
but fall back if things start looking
dicey.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Get a load of Mr. Mercenary over
here. Y'know, you're not the only
one with somethin' to prove!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|A-Azura, I...$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|I'm nearing my limit as well. Come,
let's retreat for now.$k$p$Sbs150|
